channel.title: The Handmade Kitchen Blog
channel.description: Clean eating recipes and meal planning tips for busy families

item.title: How We Eat Healthy on $150/Week for a Family of 5
item.description: Clean eating doesn't have to break the bank! Here are the exact strategies I use to feed my family real, whole foods without spending a fortune.
item.author: noreply@handmadekitchen.com (The Handmade Kitchen)

item.title: How to Get Kids Involved in the Kitchen (By Age)
item.description: Cooking with kids doesn't have to be chaotic! Here's how to make it fun, educational, and actually helpful - plus the tools that make it easier.
item.author: noreply@handmadekitchen.com (The Handmade Kitchen)

item.title: 10 Easy Kitchen Activities to Keep Kids Busy (While You Cook!)
item.description: These simple, mess-free activities keep little hands busy while you prep dinner. Most use items you already have in your kitchen!
